header.description: Integration for WebSphere Message Broker to deploy Broker Archives and start and stop Message Flows unsing the CMP API.

step-type.name: WMB Set Broker Properties
step-type.description: Set Runtime Properties for the broker.

property-ui.label: Properties
property-ui.description: A new line separated list of properties to set in the format name=value

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server.

property-ui.label: Port
property-ui.description: The port of the target server.

property-ui.label: Queue Manager
property-ui.description: The WebSphere MQ Queue Manager which the broker is using.

property-ui.label: Jar Path
property-ui.description: The full path containing both ConfigManagerProxy.jar and com.ibm.mq.jar. e.g. C:\Program Files\IBM\MQSI\7.0\classes\ConfigManagerProxy.jar:C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\com.ibm.mq.jar.
